values.name: Faith
values.description: Cultivating trust in God, self, and others, guiding our actions and decisions.

values.name: Community
values.description: Fostering a sense of belonging and unity, encouraging collaboration and support.

values.name: Excellence
values.description: Striving for the highest standards in academics, character, and service.

values.name: Partnership
values.description: Building strong relationships with stakeholders for mutual growth and success.

values.name: Service
values.description: Committing to selfless acts that benefit society, reflecting our dedication to others.
